metadata.title: CVE-2023-39189 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in the Netfilter subsystem in the Linux kernel. Thenfnl_osf_add_callback function did not validate the user mode controlledopt_num field. This flaw allows a local privileged (CAP_NET_ADMIN) attackerto trigger an out-of-bounds read, leading to a crash or informationdisclosure.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-39189` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-169-generic - 5.4.0-169.187
linux-image-5.4.0-169-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-169.187
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-169-generic - 5.4.0-169.187
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-169-lowlatency - 5.4.0-169.187
No subscription required

linux-image-5.15.0-91-generic - 5.15.0-91.101~20.04.1
linux-image-5.15.0-91-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-91.101~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-91-generic - 5.15.0-91.101~20.04.1
